resources.string: The rules are simple! Buy cases and open them. Each case contains a few types of items. There are rare, common and other items in each case. You can sell items in the inventory
There are 3 types of cases - big, medium and small. Bigger case means higher price and also higher chance to get rare items!

All dropped Items will appear in your inventory and then you can sell them if you want to. All items has their own price. The rarest item means higher price. Each item also has a star amount. 1 star means no multipliers, 2 stars multiplies item\'s price by 1.5 and 3 stars multiplies item\'s price by 3
If you are out of money, you can reset your balance to 5000 in settings
